mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Gimmicks", "32nd National Convention", "Vox Saltatoris: The Square Dancer Speaks Up" and "Quarterly Movement Report." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "Style Lab", "Contra Corner", "Ladies on the Square", "Discovery", "Advanced Dancing", "Experimental Notes", "Traditional Treasury", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "The Callers Notebook", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month", "On The Record", "Current Releases" and "Square Dance Date Book."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
